news.title: 墨西哥毒枭“门乔”毙命后，政府部署数千士兵维稳
news.title0: Mexico sends thousands of soldiers to stop violence after death of drug lord
news.content: 墨西哥头号毒枭“门乔”被击毙后，全国多地爆发暴力冲突。政府已部署约9500名士兵加强安全，至少25名国民警卫队成员在冲突中丧生。
news.content0: Mexico has deployed thousands of soldiers to bolster security after a wave of violence erupted following the death of a powerful drug lord, the country's security minister has said.
news.author: BBC

news.title: BBC为BAFTA转播未剪辑种族歧视言论道歉
news.title0: BBC sorry for airing racial slur shouted by guest with Tourette's at Baftas
news.content: 英国电影学院奖颁奖礼上，一名患有妥瑞氏症的嘉宾在两名黑人演员上台时喊出种族歧视词汇。BBC因未在延时转播中剪辑该内容而道歉。
news.content0: The BBC has apologised for not editing out a racial slur from its Bafta Film Awards coverage after a guest with Tourette's syndrome shouted out when two black actors were on stage.
news.author: BBC

news.title: FBI局长为与奥运冰球队庆祝辩护
news.title0: FBI boss Kash Patel defends Winter Olympics celebration with USA team
news.content: FBI局长卡什·帕特尔因在意大利冬奥会期间与美国冰球队在更衣室庆祝而受到批评。他为此辩护，称自己“深感荣幸”能与金牌队伍共庆。
news.content0: FBI Director Kash Patel has defended his trip to the Winter Olympics in Italy after footage of him celebrating with the USA hockey team drew online criticism.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 乌克兰谈判代表讲述与俄罗斯谈判感受
news.title0: Ukraine negotiator tells BBC how it feels to sit across table from Russia
news.content: 乌克兰谈判代表表示，与俄罗斯的军事谈判是务实的，但关键在于普京是否愿意下令停战。美国在调解和未来可能的停火监督中扮演关键角色。
news.content0: What is it like negotiating with the Russians over the war in Ukraine?
news.author: BBC

news.title: 动物园为不分离，同日安乐死亲密动物伙伴
news.title0: Much-loved unlikely animal friends die on same day
news.content: 英国纽基动物园一只水豚和一只貘因年迈健康问题，被选择在同一天实施安乐死，以确保它们不会在失去伴侣后感到孤独。
news.content0: A tapir and a capybara that had developed a strong bond were put to sleep on the same day so neither would be lonely.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 曼迪·摩尔夫妇在洛杉矶山火后重建梦想家园
news.title0: Mandy Moore and Taylor Goldsmith nearly lost their dream home in the LA fires. Here’s how they rebuilt
news.content: 美国女星曼迪·摩尔与音乐家丈夫在洛杉矶山火中几乎失去梦想家园。他们耗时数年进行重建，并在《建筑文摘》中分享了这一历程。
news.content0: In 2020, Mandy Moore and her musician husband Taylor Goldsmith bought their dream home in Altadena, California, as a family of two, hiring a team to begin renovating the romantic Spanish Colonial Revival property and update its 1930s charm. In 2023, as a family of four, with another baby on the way, they moved in and began living their new life in Altadena’s enclave of historic architecture, mountain views and small-town charm.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 布里斯班公布2032年奥运主场馆设计，引发争议
news.title0: Plans for $2.3 billion stadium ignite debate in 2032 Olympics host city
news.content: 澳大利亚布里斯班公布2032年奥运会主场馆设计方案，灵感来自当地民居“昆士兰人”。这座耗资23亿澳元的场馆计划建在遗产公园内，引发环保争议。
news.content0: Officials in Brisbane, Australia, have revealed plans for 2032’s Olympic stadium: a $2.3 billion venue inspired by the state’s typical suburban homes, known as “Queenslanders” — residential architecture that may be familiar to fans of Brisbane-based cartoon, “Bluey.”
news.author: CNN

news.title: 两届WNBA冠军卡拉·布拉克斯顿车祸去世，享年43岁
news.title0: 2-time WNBA champion Kara Braxton dies at 43 after being in a car crash
news.content: 两届WNBA总冠军得主、前底特律震动队球员卡拉·布拉克斯顿在亚特兰大遭遇车祸去世，享年43岁。她曾帮助球队在2006年和2008年夺冠。
news.content0: Two-time WNBA champion Kara Braxton died after being in a car crash in Atlanta on Saturday. She was 43.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 英国前驻美大使因涉爱泼斯坦案被捕
news.title0: U.K. Police Arrest Ex-Ambassador to U.S. Amid Epstein Accusations
news.content: 英国前驻美大使彼得·曼德尔森因涉嫌向性犯罪者杰弗里·爱泼斯坦泄露政府机密文件，被警方以“公职人员行为失当”嫌疑逮捕。
news.content0: The British police on Monday arrested Peter Mandelson, the former British ambassador to the United States, following allegations that he passed confidential government information to the sex offender Jeffrey Epstein.
news.author: NYTimes
